content: easy beginner s knit scarf by © 2014 v noël lopez designs this is probably the easiest scarf for a beginner to knit as it uses only the garter stitch and there s nothing to memorize the only reason that i suggest slipping the first stitch in each row and knitting the last through back loop is to give you smoother edges on sides happy knitting for this project i used yarn bee first love in bulky however you can use medium worsted weight as well choose a self-striping yarn to get a stunningly beautiful scarf in multiple color hues needle 6 5mm use the recommended needle given for your selected yarn gauge not that important for this project 1 cast on 18 sts for a wider scarf cast on an even # of stitches greater than 18 row 1 slip one as if to knit knit each stitch all the way across to last stitch knit the last stitch through the back loop row 2 slip one as if to knit then knit each stitch all the way across to last stitch knit the last stitch through the back loop repeat row 1 and 2 until you have reached the desired length of the scarf bind off and weave in the ends optional add fringes/tassels © 2014 v noel lopez designs hdw - all rights reserved no part of this document should be reproduced emailed copied or distributed in any form or fashion without prior consent of the author you may only use the printed information found in the pattern to make products for personal use for selling or for charity purposes please contact the author via email at vnoeldesigns@gmail com if you have any questions pertaining to the pattern disclaimer every effort has been made to produce accurate and complete instructions we cannot be responsible for variations in individuals knitting gauge and human error 2
